price: ߣߴߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߒ߬ ߘߌߦߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߕߏ߫ ߖߌ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߡߊ߬ߜߍ߲߬ߓߊ߯ ߕߍ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߟߊߞߛߌ߫
arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūna
translations: (would be) a responder to a cry
